title: About Me
description:
Hi! I'm a web developer and graphic design enthusiast with a BSc degree in computer science.

I strive to exceed expectations and pay attention to details. Whether it's creating interactive experiences out of UI designs, accelerating development or discussing the latest front-end technology, it's curiosity that wakes me up in the morning (coffee also helps).

I mainly work on the front-end, but I have a great interest in most things related to software development and computer science. Keeping up to date on the latest technologies is something I love to do in my free time, especially since the web is constantly evolving.
shortDescription: Front-end developer and a graphic design enthusiast.
